problem.markdown:
1. In EDM process generally the erosion in most of the materials is higher ( ) with reverse polarity ( ) irrespective of the polarity (x) with direct polarity ( ) none of the above
2. The breakdown of EDM fluid is due to ( ) intrinsic. (x) avalanche. ( ) ionic. ( ) none of the above ( ) all of the above
3. Is Lazeranko’s model ( ) Semi analytical ( ) Analytical ( ) Semi emperical (x) Empirical
4. Can taper be calculated by Lazeranko’s model (x) Yes ( ) No ( ) Not applicable
5. Can surface finish be evaluated form Lazeranko’s model ( ) No (x) Yes ( ) Not relevant
